page.title: 07Village Hall
page.content: The village hall was built in 1972 and plays an important role in the life of the local community. The building is located at the centre of the village, alongside the main road and close to the primary school. It contains the branch library, a kitchen and floor space large enough for over 300 people. It can be hired at #2 per hour and can be used at any time until midnight. The hall is in full use throughout the year except during August when most people are on holiday. Here is a list of regular activities held in the hall. Nursery Yoga Dancing Cub Scouts Youth Club Library Bingo Garden Club Clinic Meetings Ballet/Modern Dance Club
